title: How to Export Rock Band 2 Songs to Rock Band 3

steps.headline: Load 10 dollars of points onto your console.
Turn on Rock Band 3 and go to the Main Menu.
Enter the code that appears on the back of your Rock Band 2 manual.
steps.description: (Note: This may be the same code that you used to get the “Bonus Downloadable Tracks.”)

steps.headline: Choose “Rock Band 2 Export Pack” on the next screen and confirm your purchase.
steps.description: The Rock Band 2 songs will then be exported to your console and available for play in Rock Band 3.

steps.headline: Congratulations!
steps.description: You now have increased your Rock Band library to a wide variety of music!

text: Load 10 dollars of points onto your console.  Turn on Rock Band 3 and go to the Main Menu.  Select"Get More Songs", then "Redeem Code"  Enter the code that appears on the back of your Rock Band 2 manual. (Note: This may be the same code that you used to get the “Bonus Downloadable Tracks.”) Choose “Rock Band 2 Export Pack” on the next screen and confirm your purchase. The Rock Band 2 songs will then be exported to your console and available for play in Rock Band 3. Congratulations! You now have increased your Rock Band library to a wide variety of music!
sentences: Load 10 dollars of points onto your console.
Turn on Rock Band 3 and go to the Main Menu.
Select"Get More Songs", then "Redeem Code"  Enter the code that appears on the back of your Rock Band 2 manual.
(Note: This may be the same code that you used to get the “Bonus Downloadable Tracks.”) Choose “Rock Band 2 Export Pack” on the next screen and confirm your purchase.
The Rock Band 2 songs will then be exported to your console and available for play in Rock Band 3.
You now have increased your Rock Band library to a wide variety of music!
